config.dynamic_fps.title: Changing Wishes for Changing FPS
config.dynamic_fps.idle_time_tooltip: There is a special mood, / If you be away; / Thou present in all but mind.
config.dynamic_fps.uncap_menu_frame_rate: I prithee, give no limits to my FPS. I am a menu, and privileged to render.
config.dynamic_fps.graphics_state_minima: Then I degraded from normal graphics, / And come now to reload the lands!
config.dynamic_fps.show_toasts_tooltip: Shall thy messenger send toasty letters or await your return?
config.dynamic_fps.run_garbage_collector: Degrade unused words into nothing when gaining a mood thus.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.dynamic_f: The seasons alter: Machination-usage and FPS / Fall in the fresh mind of the calmed user;
